description: Advanced Values for Alloy DB Aurora

alloy-db.description: Resource values as per the module documentation https://registry.terraform.io/modules/GoogleCloudPlatform/alloy-db/google/1.1.2

primary_instance.description: `primary_instance` values as per the module documentation https://registry.terraform.io/modules/GoogleCloudPlatform/alloy-db/google/1.1.2?tab=inputs

instance_id.description: The ID of the primary instance

display_name.description: The display name of the primary instance

database_flags.description: Database flags for the primary instance

gce_zone.description: The GCE zone for the primary instance

availability_type.description: The availability type for the primary instance

machine_cpu_count.description: The number of CPUs for the primary instance

disable.description: Specifies whether the primary instance is enabled or disabled
